statements: DELETE FROM FoundationGrant WHERE recipient_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM FoundationGrant WHERE recipient_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM FoundationGrant WHERE grant_amount > 5000 AND grant_date < '2022-01-01';

DELETE FROM grants WHERE grant_id = 10 AND grant_recipient = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM donors WHERE donor_location = 'New York' AND donor_name = 'Alice Smith';
DELETE FROM recipients WHERE total_grants_received = 0 AND location = 'New York';
